verses.text: If a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w steal|strong="H1589"\w* an \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, or a \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, and \w kill|strong="H2873"\w* it, or \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* it; he shall \w restore|strong="H7999"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* for an \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* for a \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*.\f + \fr 22.1 \ft or a sheep: or, or a goat\f*

¶ If a \w thief|strong="H1590"\w* be \w found|strong="H4672"\w* breaking \w up|strong="H4290"\w*, and be \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* that he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \add there shall\add* no \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \add be shed\add* for him.

If the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* be \w risen|strong="H2224"\w* upon him, \add there shall be\add* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \add shed\add* for him; \add for\add* he should make \w full|strong="H7999"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*; if he have nothing, then he shall be \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* for his \w theft|strong="H1591"\w*.

If the \w theft|strong="H1591"\w* be \w certainly|strong="H4672"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*, whether it be \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, or \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, or \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*; he shall \w restore|strong="H7999"\w* \w double|strong="H8147"\w*.

¶ If a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall cause a \w field|strong="H7704"\w* or \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* to be \w eaten|strong="H1197"\w*, and shall \w put|strong="H7971"\w* in his \w beast|strong="H1165"\w*, and shall \w feed|strong="H1197"\w* in another \w man’s|strong="H0312"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*; of the \w best|strong="H4315"\w* of his own \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and of the \w best|strong="H4315"\w* of his own \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, shall he make \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*.

¶ If \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* break \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w catch|strong="H4672"\w* in \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w*, so that the stacks of \w corn|strong="H1430"\w*, or the standing \w corn|strong="H7054"\w*, or the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, be \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* \add therewith;\add* he that \w kindled|strong="H1197"\w* the \w fire|strong="H1200"\w* shall \w surely|strong="H7999"\w* make \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*.

¶ If a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* unto his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* or \w stuff|strong="H3627"\w* to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w*, and it be \w stolen|strong="H1589"\w* out of the \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; if the \w thief|strong="H1590"\w* be \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, let him \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w double|strong="H8147"\w*.

If the \w thief|strong="H1590"\w* be \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, then the \w master|strong="H1167"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall be \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \w judges|strong="H0430"\w*, \add to see\add* whether he have \w put|strong="H7971"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* unto his \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w goods|strong="H4399"\w*.

For all \w manner|strong="H1697"\w* of \w trespass|strong="H6588"\w*, \add whether it be\add* for \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, for \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, for \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, for \w raiment|strong="H8008"\w*, \add or\add* for any manner of lost \w thing|strong="H0009"\w*, which \add another\add* \w challengeth|strong="H0559"\w* to be his, the \w cause|strong="H1697"\w* of both \w parties|strong="H8147"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* before the \w judges|strong="H0430"\w*; \add and\add* whom the \w judges|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w*, he shall \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w double|strong="H8147"\w* unto his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*.

If a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* unto his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* an \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, or an \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, or a \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, or any \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w*; and it \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, or be \w hurt|strong="H7665"\w*, or driven \w away|strong="H7617"\w*, no man \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \add it:\add*

\add Then\add* shall an \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* be between them \w both|strong="H8147"\w*, that he hath not \w put|strong="H7971"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* unto his \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w goods|strong="H4399"\w*; and the \w owner|strong="H1167"\w* of it shall \w accept|strong="H3947"\w* \add thereof\add*, and he shall not make \add it\add* \w good|strong="H7999"\w*.
And if it be \w stolen|strong="H1589"\w* from him, he shall make \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w* unto the \w owner|strong="H1167"\w* thereof.

If it be torn in \w pieces|strong="H2963"\w*, \add then\add* let him \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* it \add for\add* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w*, \add and\add* he shall not make \w good|strong="H7999"\w* that which was \w torn|strong="H2966"\w*.

¶ And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w borrow|strong="H7592"\w* \add ought\add* of his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, and it be \w hurt|strong="H7665"\w*, or \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, the \w owner|strong="H1167"\w* thereof \add being\add* not with \w it|strong="H5973"\w*, he shall \w surely|strong="H7999"\w* make \add it\add* \w good|strong="H7999"\w*.

\add But\add* if the \w owner|strong="H1167"\w* thereof \add be\add* with it, he shall not make \add it\add* \w good|strong="H7999"\w*: if it \add be\add* an \w hired|strong="H7916"\w* \add thing\add*, it \w came|strong="H0935"\w* for his \w hire|strong="H7939"\w*.

¶ And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w entice|strong="H6601"\w* a \w maid|strong="H1330"\w* that is not \w betrothed|strong="H0781"\w*, and \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* with her, he shall \w surely|strong="H4117"\w* \w endow|strong="H4117"\w* her to be his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

If her \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w utterly|strong="H3985"\w* \w refuse|strong="H3985"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* her unto him, he shall \w pay|strong="H8254"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* according to the \w dowry|strong="H4119"\w* of \w virgins|strong="H1330"\w*.\f + \fr 22.17 \ft pay: Heb. weigh\f*
¶ Thou shalt not suffer a \w witch|strong="H3784"\w* to \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.
¶ Whosoever \w lieth|strong="H7901"\w* with a \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ He that \w sacrificeth|strong="H2076"\w* unto \add any\add* \w god|strong="H0430"\w*, \w save|strong="H1115"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* only, he shall be utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w*.

¶ Thou shalt neither \w vex|strong="H3238"\w* a \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, nor \w oppress|strong="H3905"\w* him: for ye were \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.
¶ Ye shall not \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* any \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, or fatherless \w child|strong="H3490"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* them in any \w wise|strong="H6031"\w*, and they \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* at \w all|strong="H6817"\w* unto me, I will \w surely|strong="H8085"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* their \w cry|strong="H6818"\w*;

And my \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* shall wax \w hot|strong="H2734"\w*, and I will \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* you with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; and your \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* shall be \w widows|strong="H0490"\w*, and your \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*.

¶ If thou \w lend|strong="H3867"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* to \add any of\add* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add that is\add* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* by thee, thou shalt not be to him as an \w usurer|strong="H5383"\w*, neither shalt thou \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* upon him \w usury|strong="H5392"\w*.

If thou at \w all|strong="H2254"\w* \w take|strong="H2254"\w* thy \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w raiment|strong="H8008"\w* to \w pledge|strong="H2254"\w*, thou shalt \w deliver|strong="H7725"\w* it unto him \w by|strong="H5704"\w* that the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* goeth \w down|strong="H0935"\w*:

For that \add is\add* his \w covering|strong="H3682"\w* only, it \add is\add* his \w raiment|strong="H8071"\w* for his \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*: wherein shall he \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w*? and it shall come to pass, when he \w crieth|strong="H6817"\w* unto me, that I will \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*; for I \add am\add* \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w*.

¶ Thou shalt not \w revile|strong="H7043"\w* the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, nor \w curse|strong="H0779"\w* the \w ruler|strong="H5387"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 22.28 \ft gods: or, judges\f*

¶ Thou shalt not \w delay|strong="H0309"\w* \add to offer\add* the first of thy ripe \w fruits|strong="H4395"\w*, and of thy \w liquors|strong="H1831"\w*: the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* shalt thou \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto me.\f + \fr 22.29 \ft the first…: Heb. thy fulness\f*\f + \fr 22.29 \ft liquors: Heb. tear\f*

\w Likewise|strong="H3651"\w* shalt thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* with thine \w oxen|strong="H7794"\w*, \add and\add* with thy \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*: \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* it shall be with his \w dam|strong="H0517"\w*; on the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it me.

¶ And ye shall be \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* unto me: neither shall ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add any\add* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \add that is\add* torn of \w beasts|strong="H2966"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*; ye shall \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* it to the \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w*.
